props.title: Discover the Benefits of Gold Tanning
props.content: At Ohana Sun Tanning, we offer a luxurious gold tanning experience that goes beyond the ordinary. Our specialized gold tanning solution is enriched with premium, skin-nourishing ingredients designed to enhance your natural glow while providing deep hydration. The process is quick and effortless, ensuring an even and radiant tan tailored to your skin type. With our expert technicians guiding you through each step, you can relax knowing you're in good hands. Experience a sun-kissed look without the harmful effects of UV exposure, and leave feeling confident and rejuvenated. Embrace the beauty of a golden tan that lasts, with the added benefit of skin-loving properties that promote health and vitality. Join us at Ohana Sun Tanning and elevate your tanning experience today!

props.title: Benefits of Gold

benefits.title: Exclusive Content Access
benefits.description: Gain access to premium content tailored specifically for Gold service members, enhancing your experience and knowledge.

benefits.title: Priority Customer Support
benefits.description: Enjoy priority access to our customer support team, ensuring your inquiries are addressed promptly and efficiently.

benefits.title: Personalized Coaching Sessions
benefits.description: Receive personalized coaching sessions to help you achieve your goals and maximize the benefits of the Gold service.

benefits.title: Enhanced Networking Opportunities
benefits.description: Connect with other Gold service members through exclusive events and forums, expanding your professional network.

props.description: Discover the many advantages of choosing Gold at Ohana Sun Tanning

props.title: What Clients Say About Gold
props.description: Hear from satisfied clients who've experienced our Gold.

testimonials.name: Christina Sierra
testimonials.review: This place, these people, the tan I have the luxury of wearing now, all beyond exceptional. I was pleasantly surprised by their honesty. One night, I'd gone in for a custom spray tan (Gail is a wildly talented custom sprayer!) and I lost my gold bracelet I'd been wearing for 13 years upon removing for tanning process. Once I realized it was gone, I called to see if perhaps someone had found it. To my pleasant surprise, the lovely Ariel had found it on the floor & said to come on in & get it. A less honest person could have kept it, as there is some value there, but mostly sentimental for me. It was returned safely to me when I arrived...& for this I shall always remain their loyal (& grateful!) customer. Thank you Ariel & Image Sun, you guys are the BEST!

faqs.answer: The Gold service offers comprehensive support, including personalized consultations, premium resources, and priority access to our experts throughout the 30-day period.
faqs.question: What does the Gold service include in the 30 Days Package?

faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with the Gold service. Just reach out within the period for a full refund.
faqs.question: Is there a money-back guarantee for the Gold service?

faqs.answer: Support can be accessed through our dedicated online portal, via email, or by scheduling one-on-one sessions with our team during the 30 days.
faqs.question: How do I access the support provided in the Gold service?

faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade to the Gold service at any time. Just contact our support team, and they will assist you with the transition.
faqs.question: Can I upgrade to the Gold service after starting a different package?

faqs.answer: The Gold service is offered at a flat rate for the 30 Days Package. There are no hidden fees, ensuring complete transparency in pricing.
faqs.question: Are there any additional fees for the Gold service?

faqs.answer: While results may vary, clients typically experience significant improvements in their goals or projects within the 30-day timeframe, thanks to our tailored approach.
faqs.question: What kind of results can I expect from the Gold service?

props.title: Frequently Asked Questions
props.description: Get answers to common questions about Gold.

props.title: Ready To Book Gold?
props.description: Schedule your gold appointment today and experience the difference.
